text: Bow can mean: (Rhyming with "no":) * Bow (weapon), "bows and arrows" * Bow (music), the bow used to play musical instruments * A type of knot which has two large loops. It is used to tie simple things such as apron strings, shoelaces, or ribbons on wrapped-up presents or for a fashion accessory in womens' hair. (Rhyming with "now":) * Bow (ship), the forward part of the hull of a ship or boat * a gesture, see Bowing ==People== * Clara Bow, an actress
title: Bow
